name: make-me-project
description: A platform that provides unique DIY (Do It Yourself) project suggestions using OpenAI. Explore a variety of projects, their materials, and steps to create them.

scripts.build:all: npm install && concurrently "npm run build:client" "npm run build:server" "npm run docker:build"
scripts.lint:all: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint:fix

hooks.pre-commit: cd client && npx lint-staged && cd ../server && npx lint-staged
